title: Thirteen Offerings: Stories of Ithiria
description: In this fantasy anthology, the brothers Bondye have come from all across the world of Ithiria with tales of weary navigators, fearsome monsters, and ancient creatures. However, only a few of the brothers are able to make the trip. With interruptions from the fates and delayed siblings, they struggle to present the thirteen tales needed to revitalize their guardianship of Ithiria.
author: April Wahlin
